mind_driven_programming.title: Mind-Driven Programming
mind_driven_programming.description: A modular logic engine that interprets thoughts, emotions, and time-based triggers into executable logic.

digital_afterlife_engine.title: Digital Afterlife Engine
digital_afterlife_engine.description: An AI-powered system that preserves digital identity and simulates posthumous interactions using memory and emotion modeling.

agentflow_builder.title: AgentFlow Builder
agentflow_builder.description: A visual framework for designing and deploying multi-agent workflows with logic, memory, and automation.
